q: I'm just thankful.'' After starting the year as a backup to Kevin Kolb , Michael Vick is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football, he said. ''This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here.''
